verses.verse: For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> that shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> as an <S%H8574>oven;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2086>proud,<s%> yes, and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7564>wickedly,<s%> shall be <S%H7179>stubble:<s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H935>comes<s%> shall <S%H3857>burn<s%> them up, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that it shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them neither <S%H8328>root<s%> nor <S%H6057>branch.<s%>

But to you that <S%H3373>fear<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall the <S%H8121>Sun<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H2224>arise<s%> with <S%H4832>healing<s%> in his <S%H3671>wings;<s%> and you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H6335>grow<s%> up as <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H4770>stall.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6072>tread<s%> down the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> for they shall be <S%H665>ashes<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I shall <S%H6213>do<s%> this, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> you the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to him in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H935>coming<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>dreadful<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And he shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> to the <S%H1121>children,<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with a <S%H2764>curse.<s%>
